Post-Match Reflections: Willie Green expressed pride in his team's effort despite the loss, stating that they took a step in the right direction and will get home and get healthy.
Jordan Hawkins mentioned that they will continue to grind out as many minutes as they can, compete, and play hard.
Brandon Ingram emphasized the need to tighten up and build, focusing on improving their defense and offense.
Zion Williamson acknowledged the team's losses but highlighted the positives, stating that they played more aggressively and he needs to be more patient offensively.
